turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I'd be happy to. Which Starbucks would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order from the one at 2335 Georgia Street in Amarillo.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I can do that. What kind of drink would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: An iced caffe americano please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a Grande today. I'm a little tired.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry you're tired. Do you want any milk in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, just a splash.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They don't have 1% milk,. They have nonfat and 2%. Would you like one of those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect.  Do you need any sugar or flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, I better not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I understand. You're sweet enough as it is. Do you want any food to go with your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, not today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have a grand iced caffe americano with a splash of 2% milk. Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct. Put it on my account on file, please. You already have the info

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Your total is $2.75, and your payment receipt will be sent to you via text message on your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, assistant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.. Your grande iced caffe americano with a splash of 2% milk is now on order with the Starbucks at 2335 Georgia Street in Amarillo. It will be ready soon. Can I do anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. Thanks!
